db:article.db:para: The PCRE library is a set of functions that implement regular expression pattern matching using the same syntax and semantics as Perl 5.
Optionally used in Qt Core (QRegularExpression). Configure with -system-pcre or -no-pcre to avoid.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/3rdparty/pcre2/deps/sljit.
